marketplaces.name: open-skilled-sdd-marketplace
marketplaces.description: Official marketplace for Open Spec-Driven Development Claude Code plugin
marketplaces.repo_description: Enhancing AI coding assistants through open Spec-driven development (Spec-driven development for AI coding assistants), adopting the Claude Code Skills approach, compatible with various CLI and IDE AI coding assistants that support AGENTS.md.

files..claude-plugin/plugin.json:
{
  "name": "open-skilled-sdd",
  "description": "Open Spec-driven development workflow for Claude Code: OpenSpec, PRPs, Spec Kit, spec-workflow-mcp, BMad-Method, 6A workflow.",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "author": {
    "name": "forztf"
  },
  "homepage": "https://github.com/forztf/open-skilled-sdd",
  "license": "MIT",
  "keywords": [
    "specifications",
    "spec-driven",
    "requirements",
    "EARS",
    "workflow",
    "testing",
    "documentation"
  ],
  "skills": [
    "./skills/openspec-proposal-creation-cn",
    "./skills/openspec-implementation-cn",
    "./skills/openspec-archiving-cn",
    "./skills/openspec-context-loading-cn",
    "./skills/openspec-proposal-creation",
    "./skills/openspec-implementation",
    "./skills/openspec-archiving",
    "./skills/openspec-context-loading",
    "./skills/speckit-constitution-zh",
    "./skills/speckit-specify-zh",
    "./skills/speckit-clarify-zh",
    "./skills/speckit-plan-zh",
    "./skills/speckit-tasks-zh",
    "./skills/speckit-analyze-zh",
    "./skills/speckit-checklist-zh",
    "./skills/speckit-implement-zh"
  ]
}

plugins.name: open-skilled-sdd
plugins.description: open spec-driven development workflow: OpenSpec, PRPs, Spec Kit, spec-workflow-mcp, BMad-Method, 6A workflow
